text: Sérgio Filipe Santos Oliveira, known as Pirata (born 1 February 1987) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Beira-Mar. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Ovarense on 12 March 2006 in a game against Gondomar. ==References== ==External links== Category:1987 births Category:People from Ovar Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:A.D. title: Pirata (footballer)
